lines.text:
[surprised]
Loneliness? Of course I feel loneliness.
Me too. Sometimes. Not all the time.
Would you like me to ease it for you?
I could ease it for you, maybe...
With all its shame and drudgery, it is still a beautiful world.
I don't like it... I don't like it at all!
Don't you realize he's getting over a painful divorce? He doesn't want to be having sex with people.
I'd just like to pay tribute, if I may, to the generous nature of Sunray girls... especially in regard to the easing of a man's loneliness.
At least Charlie Rich seems to base his acts of procreation on a foundation of love and mutual respect.
No people skills. People like to feel welcome, you know.
